reviewText: Had always heard of Joseph Mohr and Franz Gruber, but didn't know much about them other than they wrote "Silent Night". Great story, and good acting.
Wonderful story!! Thanks!
dedication to our fellow man shines through, here; we could all learn much!
Excellent movie. I recommend it.
Great new edition to my Christmas movie library!
Beautiful story we thoroughly enjoyed this movie.  This dvd will be watched many times in our home.

This was a delightful movie about the writing of the song "Silent Night".  I knew some of the story about the song but this movie made it so real with the location, costuming, etc.  I thoroughly enjoyed it and highly recommend it as a classic Christmas movie.

Very strong and powerful movie. Highly recommended for the Christmas season or any season! Liked how Joseph Mohr brought people to church who normally didn't go to sing in the choir and preached in German instead of Latin so they all understood in their language (even though he got in trouble by the Catholic priest) Definitely a Godly man who also brought an awesome song we sing every year!
I saw this movie on the BYU channel & I liked it. It is about the story of how the song Silent night came about.
A very moving family film.
It's a good film to watch. The acting was pretty good, I likes the scenery. Overall I certainly be watching this film again.
It was great
heart warming!  Story kind of simple but good to see. The world had political correctness even back in the early 1800's.
Christmas music brings joy to my heart and watching this movie brought tears to my heart!  The feeling of God enters into ones heart when singing Silent Night during a Christmas Eve Service.
Was a wonderful family movie.  Great story about the song Silent Night's Composer.  Our Bible Study really enjoyed the movie.
This film surprised me . It is beautiful to look at and the music wonderful. Acting was good. They played with history but it still a good film. Glad I ordered it.
Beautiful!! I had seen a preview for this movie, and it made me curious, so I ordered it - and I was definitely not disappointed. Very encouraging and uplifting, and also somewhat funny at times. :-)
I thoroughly enjoyed this lovely little movie about the man who wrote the hymn Silent Night.  I wish we had more modern day stories like this made for the big screen!
This is an awesome story...it is unfortunate that more people don't have the heart that this man had...it is no wonder the song he wrote is now a world wide novelty...I would recommend this story!!!
Good movie! Excellent reminder that in the face of adversity, faith and love can triumph! The whole family enjoyed it.
good service and oustanding movie
Great story told well
Well done.
A very good movie, charms the soul and enlightens the mind.
Wanted to watch it again immediately after finishing it the first time (and did). This movie will be enjoyed for years to come and not just at Christmas time. It is truly a good Christian movie.
Beautiful tape, great delivery, Rod

The movie tells the story about how the Silent Night song came into existence.  The priest and music director who created the lyrics and sang the song for the very first time.  It is a very heart warming and family oriented film.  This film illustrates the true purpose of the song and why it was written.  To share with the people who could hear this Christian song honoring Our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ, in their own language.  The priest Joseph Mohr loved people and he wanted to help them.  Very inspirational.
Wonderful film of beautiful simplicity.  Very genuine and heartfelt, not at all pretentious or too sentimental.  It shows how God can work through us to help others, one precious person at a time.

I wasn't really in a mood to watch this when it was presented to me as an option, but decided to give it a shot. What a great surprise!  A thoroughly heart-felt and touching movie that shows what faith, hope and perseverance are all about.  I've watched each year since, during Christmastime, because of these powerful messages, with the background of love and service to God.  It helps you appreciate even more the beloved hymn, for which the movie is named, as well!

I LOVE this Christmas movie. I'm so happy I found the DVD I used to look for it on Hallmark every December. now I can watch anytime! It is a wonderful movie about the Love of God shown through his servants. I think any follower of Christ would love it, regardless of your denomination. Also a great movie to share with those who may not know Christ, in a very approachable way.
Beautiful story!

How could one not give this five stars?  It does a wonderful job not only telling the amazing story, but also of the contrast between hard, cold, dead, condemning religion, and the love of God.  A must see.  Sit the family down on a cold winter evening, in front of the fireplace, hugging one another, drinking hot chocolate, and watch this movie together.  Amen
Great movie for the whole family!
Greatest Christmas Movie for the whole family!!

I rented this movie from Christian Cinema but enjoyed it so much I had to purchase a copy.  What a wonderfully uplifting film of courage in the face of adversity!  Oh, that we would all stand so strongly for God!  A must see, recommended to everyone!

10 stars found out this movie from the otherbridgestiwn media the letter writters preview was on that movie

 true story of the priest  who created the silent night  song
excellent movie

Fantastic movie!  I love movies that give the story about a person, event, or happening in life.  This story relates how the song "Silent Night" came to be.  Very good movie; kept my interest throughout.

I remember I first saw this move a couple of years ago on the BYU station, which really surprised me. Nonetheless, this is one fine and masterful piece of work. A great story of personal demons and triumphs and the prevailing theme to never give up on yourself, your dreams and the needs and hopes of others around you. I don't know how historically accurate the story is as it is based on real persons in a true story. If anything it is great entertainment and has a great message. This is one movie you will want to add to your collection to see once a year during Christmas time.
This was a wonderful movie, so glade to have in in my collection.
Excellant.

The historic and geographical authenticity of the Television film DVD "Silent Night"
distributed by
Amazon is exceptional,
which is why my friends have asked me to request several more copies.
I am familiar with the movie's original location in the Land of Salzburg, Austria
and can therefore attest to the genuine portrayal of the film's history.

Cecilia Diedrich

Wonderful movie! Has become a new family tradition as we will watch it every Christmas. And not just my family, but my brother's family and my parents watched it with us this past Christmas and both have said the same thing. They will have copies of their own in case we are not together. I imaging my sister-in-law will take it to their family gathering Christmas eve this year and they will all want it too! Thank you!  :0)

This is a serious, artful movie executed with passion by the director and entire cast.  The authentic settings were impressive.  This movie is not going to entertain children, but the thoughtful adults in the room will quickly appreciate everything about this movie.
Very moving . . . an emotional and uplifting movie!

Received as a gift. This is the most dear & inspiring Christmas movie. I wish more people were aware of it. It's such a "Hidden Gem".
My hope is that more people will get the word-out, so that it can become a new "Christmas Classic"!
Not a Catholic but LOVED the movie!!
Excellent movie.
It was an excellent movie.  It is the history of how the Christmas song, Silent Night came to be. I enjoyed it very much.
I do so much enjoy this movie.  I cry every time.  It was money well invested as well as time invested in watching it over and over and over.  Thanks.
Great Movie.  A must-see!
an excellent movie. tells a true story on how Silent night came to be.
A lovely movie, very enjoyable and touching.  Great for family and very inspiring. A good deal of it is fictional.
Wonderful story
Holiday must!
An interesting and quite good Christmas movie for the entire family.
Good family movie, you can't go wrong having this in your Christmas movie library. It's the story of how the song "Silent Night" was written.
Outstanding movie on the origin of the song

A best movie...not to be missed movie.  Wonderful story about how a preacher should be...living in his community, involved with all his community and a special love and tender care for his parishoners.  Gave me inspiration on how I should be in today's world.  I loved the way the music was put together  one writing the lyrics and they other the music notes and of course God creating the events leadsing up to its creation and then the preformance.
It will be a favorite for many years. Also bought copies to share.  You haven't been to church for awhile - watch this then pray God will lead you
to a church with a preacher totaly commited to the truth of the Bible.
